102 template <class ObjectType, class EvaluatorType>
103 class stVPTree: public stMetricTree<ObjectType, EvaluatorType>{
104 
105  public:
106 
110  typedef struct VPTreeHeader{
116  char Magic[4];
117 
121  stPageID Root;
122 
126  stCount Height;
127 
131  stCount ObjectCount;
132 
136  stSize NodeCount;
137  } stVPTreeHeader;
138

143

191 
197  stPageID GetRoot(){
198  return this->Header->Root;
199  }//end GetRoot
200  #endif //__stDEBUG__
201 
205  virtual stCount GetHeight(){
206  return Header->Height;
207  }//end GetHeight
208 
212  virtual long GetNumberOfObjects(){
213  return Header->ObjectCount;
214  }//end GetNumberOfObjects

276  #ifndef __stDEBUG__
277 
280  stPageID GetRoot(){
281  return this->Header->Root;

283  #endif // __stDEBUG__
284 
288  void SetRoot(stPageID root){
289  Header->Root = root;
290  HeaderUpdate = true;
291  }//end SetRoot
292 
296  void LoadHeader();
297 
303  void DefaultHeader();
304 
308  void WriteHeader(){
309  if (HeaderUpdate){
310  this->myPageManager->WriteHeaderPage(HeaderPage);
311  this->HeaderUpdate = false;
312  }//end if
313  }//end WriteHeader
314 
321  void FlushHeader(){
322  if (HeaderPage != NULL){
323  if (Header != NULL){
324  this->WriteHeader();
325  }//end if
326  this->myPageManager->ReleasePage(HeaderPage);
327  }//end if
328  }//end FlushHeader
329 
333  stPage * NewPage(){
334  this->Header->NodeCount++;
335  return this->myPageManager->GetNewPage();
336  this->HeaderUpdate = true;
337  }//end NewPage
338 
342  void DisposePage(stPage * page){
343  Header->NodeCount--;
344  this->myPageManager->DisposePage(page);
345  HeaderUpdate = true;
346  }//end DisposePage
347 
353  stPageID MakeVPTree(tObject ** objects, stDistanceIndex * & selected,
354  long size);
355 
360  long SelectVP(tObject ** objects, stDistanceIndex * selected, long size);
361 
366  long GetMedian(tObject ** objects, stDistanceIndex * sample, long sampleSize,
367  long vantage);
368 
372  stDistance GetSecondMoment(stDistanceIndex * sample, long sampleSize, long median);
373 
377  long PickSampleSize(long size){
378  long sampleSize;
379 
380  // Try to get 10%
381  sampleSize = (long) ceil(0.09 * (double )size);
382  if (sampleSize < 50){
383  sampleSize = 50;
384  if (size < sampleSize){
385  sampleSize = size;
386  }//end if
387  }//end if
388  if (sampleSize > 500){
389  sampleSize = 500;
390  if (size < sampleSize){
391  sampleSize = size;
392  }//end if
393  }//end if
394  return sampleSize;
395  }//end PickSampleSize
396 
400  void MakeSample(stDistanceIndex * sample, long sampleSize,
401  stDistanceIndex * selected, long size);
402 
407  void Resize();
408 
416  void RangeQuery(tObject * sample, stDistance range,
417  tResult * result, stPageID page);
418 
426  void NearestQuery(tObject * sample, stCount k, tResult * result,
427  stPageID page);
428 
429 };//end stVPTree
